emails.subject: Invoice #7744 payment status
emails.body: Checking status on Invoice #7744. Please advise remittance timeline.

emails.subject: Missed weekly maintenance
emails.body: Our weekly maintenance was missed yesterday at North Hills Medical campus. Grass is overgrown and the client is unhappy. Please send a crew ASAP.

emails.subject: Quote for additional landscaping
emails.body: Need a quote for expanded landscape scope at Summit Office Park. Adding irrigation to the east courtyard and new plantings along the main entrance.

emails.subject: Certificate of Insurance needed
emails.body: We need an updated COI for the Durham Public Schools contract renewal. Please send to our risk management office by Friday.

emails.subject: PO-2024-1205 discrepancy
emails.body: Invoice amount for PO-2024-1205 is $2,400 higher than the purchase order. Please review and provide a corrected invoice or explanation for the overage.

emails.subject: Emergency tree removal needed
emails.body: A large oak branch fell in the parking lot after last night's storm. Need emergency removal before stores open at 9am tomorrow. This is urgent.

emails.subject: New hire equipment for Marcus Johnson
emails.body: Marcus Johnson starts next Monday in the Excavation division. Please make sure his PPE kit (hard hat, vest, boots, radio) is ready for pickup Friday.

emails.subject: Change order #3 for site work
emails.body: Attached is change order #3 for the Maple Ridge site work project. Additional storm drainage required per revised civil drawings. Please provide pricing within 48 hours.
